conbody.p: The basic building block of each page is a widget. Individual snippets of HTML, CSS, and Javascript can be turned into widgets via the polymorphic toWidget function. Using do-notation, you can combine these individual widgets into larger widgets, eventually containing all the content of your page.
Unwrapping these widgets is usually performed within the defaultLayout function, which can be used to apply a unified look-and-feel to all your pages.
